types.html:
quatre volontés f pl (plural only)

  1. (informal) everything someone wants, someone's every wish
    faire les quatre volontés de quelqu'un ― to fetch and carry for someone, to pander to someone's every whim
    imposer ses quatre volontés à quelqu'un ― to make someone pander to one's every whim
trans: everything someone wants, someone's every wish

title: quatre volontés
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ka.tʁə vɔ.lɔ̃.te/
